授業目的: 本授業の目的は１）社会問題に関する様々なタイプの文章を精読をすることによって、語彙力を高め、読解力を向上させること、　２）時間を計った速読演習により読解スピードを高めること、３）様々な社会問題に関して自分の意見や考えを言うことができること、である。
到達目標: 文章の種類、読解の目的に応じ適切なリーディング技能および技法を適用し、より速く英文の内容を理解することができること、与えられた社会的会問題に関し自分の意見を表現できることを目指す。

トピック.授業計画1:
Class will be basically conducted following the textbook; some supplementary materials will be also used . Students are required to read the textbook, check vocabulary, and do some research to prepare for the class.
Students will read, listen, discuss, and write on the issues given in the textbook and supplementary materials. The sequence of the units of the textbook to be dealt with in class will be given in the beginning of the course. There will be quizzes at certain intervals to review what students learned in class and to enrich their vocabulary.
There will be a Zoom meeting once or twice during the term; students will be having a discussion in groups or pairs on the topics dealt with in the textbook.
Details will be given in the beginning of the term.
トピック.授業外学習2: Reading and writing assignments will be given regularly.   Students are expected to prepare for each class by going over the material to be covered.
